ref.mixed-citation:
Chan JF
,
Yuan S
,
Kok KH
A familial cluster of pneumonia associated with the 2019 novel coronavirus indicating person-to-person transmission: a study of a family cluster. Lancet. 395( 10223), 514– 523 ( 2020). 31986261

note.p: • This research reported that COVID-19 could transmit from person to person in hospital and family settings, which provided the evidence that COVID-19 could spread from person to person. It is very important for ministries of health and individuals in other countries outside of China.
